azurerm_automation_dsc_nodeconfiguration.description: Manages a Automation DSC Node Configuration.

name.description: Specifies the name of the DSC Node Configuration. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the DSC Node Configuration is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

automation_account_name.description: The name of the automation account in which the DSC Node Configuration is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

content_embedded.description: The PowerShell DSC Node Configuration (mof content).

create.description: Used when creating the Automation DSC Node Configuration.

update.description: Used when updating the Automation DSC Node Configuration.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Automation DSC Node Configuration.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Automation DSC Node Configuration.
